video.title: Stan Lee's Superhumans
video.synopsis: Comic book icon Stan Lee and Daniel Browning Smith -- one of the world's most pliable men -- meet with some of the most extraordinarily gifted people.

episodes.synopsis: Daniel travels to India to investigate Rajmohan Nair, who can supposedly let electric currents pass through his body without harm.
episodes.title: Electro Man

episodes.synopsis: Meet the planet's fastest gunslinger. Using electromyography, we investigate whether his speed goes beyond what science says is humanly possible.
episodes.title: Killer Punch

episodes.synopsis: Dean Karnazes ran 50 marathons in 50 consecutive days, and then aimed to run the 1,300 miles back home. How can his body not suffer extreme fatigue?
episodes.title: Hammer Head

episodes.synopsis: Daniel investigates Tim Cridland, who claims to be able to switch off pain. He demonstrates his ability impaling himself with skewers.
episodes.title: Human Speed Bump

episodes.synopsis: Daniel goes to the Caribbean to meet Patrick Musimu, who's able to hold his breath for over 8 minutes and dive to 656 feet on a single breath.
episodes.title: Human Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Isao Machii is a modern-day samurai. To find out whether Isao is truly superhuman, Daniel asks him to try cutting a speeding rubber bullet in midair.
episodes.title: Human Crash Test Dummy

episodes.synopsis: Daniel goes to Wisconsin to meet a human guinea pig who allows some of the world's deadliest snakes to bite him and as he records the results.
episodes.title: Rubber Band Man

episodes.synopsis: A man claims to be able to knock a man to the ground without touching him. Next, meet Salim Haini, dubbed "the man who eats anything."
episodes.title: Jaw Breaker

episodes.synopsis: A monk smashes steel on his head, Daniel watches a man hold back a car, tests a man's superior stomach control, and tracks an archer's accuracy.
episodes.title: Unbreakable

episodes.synopsis: Daniel meets the Internet's top jumper, a man who breaks baseball bats with one kick, a man who speeds on all fours, and a man who dives with sharks.
episodes.title: Shark Master

episodes.synopsis: Daniel meets a man with immunity to scorpions, a man who uses mind control on animals, the NASA "supersniffer," and a man claiming he swam the Amazon.
episodes.title: Beast Masters

episodes.synopsis: Meet a man who climbed Everest ten times without extra oxygen, a herd of goats with spider DNA, a woman reared with monkeys, and a top skateboarder.
episodes.title: Spiderpower

episodes.synopsis: Daniel meets a German speed demon, a man bends objects with his mind, Nigel runs on a track of broken glass, a man claims to speak 637 words a minute.
episodes.title: Rocket Blader

episodes.synopsis: Daniel investigates claims of unaided human flight, immunity to cold, the fastest backward running, and hands so hot they can boil water.
episodes.title: Bird-Man

episodes.synopsis: An arm wrestler fights a robot, a "human roller skate" races a go-kart, Daniel faces a knife thrower, a man destroys buildings with his bare hands.
episodes.title: Robo Men

episodes.synopsis: Daniel meets a man with an exceptionally strong neck, a man alleging he is the world's first cyborg, and a deft Seattle yo-yo expert.
episodes.title: Yo Yo Ninja

episodes.synopsis: Daniel investigates a Nevada man with powerful lungs, a man who hangs steel bars from his eyelids, a man with agile reflexes, and a nunchuck master.
episodes.title: Steel Face

episodes.synopsis: A man tries to hold his breath for 20 mins., a blind man sees with his mind, a man lifts weights with his skin, another puts deadly items in his nose.
episodes.title: Supersight

episodes.synopsis: A man penetrates a coconut with his finger, another man turns his legs 180 degrees, a diver hits the water at 55 mph, and a jumper defies gravity.
episodes.title: Finger of Steel

episodes.synopsis: Daniel tests a man who lifts 1,000 lbs. with his jaw, a man who claims to feel no pain, a college quarterback's trick throws, and a jet-pack pilot.
episodes.title: Human Shield

episodes.synopsis: Daniel verifies a man with steel-tough hands, a human-powered machine, a man who recalls every detail of his life, and a woman with a very loud voice,
episodes.title: Super Special
